name: Lazy Devil's game life /废宅魔王的幸福生活
description: The demon sovereign's frontier territory was raided by brave human, and the devil king decide to deal with the threat herself. However, it seems that some people try to wastting time so that the devil can't find the brave human. The devil have to find clues himself and find the brave human to defeat him.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher
